Red Access Card Required To Use This!
Green Access Card Required To Use This!
Blue Access Card Required To Use This!
Management Access Card Required To Use This!
Now you have a machine gun. Ho-Ho-Ho.

Daytime Drama II: Opera of Despair can be configured using the menus.

Press Escape to bring up the menu. Press F1 to bring up this screen.

NEW GAME: starts a new game. Pick your difficulty and go.
GAME STATES: save your current game, or load a current one. Previous
saves don't work between versions of the game.
OPTIONS: configure and tweak Daytime Drama II or GZDoom
HELP SCREEN: this help screen
CREDITS: the people who worked on the game.
EXIT TO SYSTEM: exit the game

Under the OPTIONS menu you have the following options:

CUSTOMIZE CONTROLS: you can customize the keys and
buttons that control SCOOTALOO.
MOUSE OPTIONS: fine tune your mouse settings
JOYSTICK OPTIONS: fine tune your joystick settings
HUD OPTIONS: configure default crosshair and HUD options
DIALOGUE AND CUTSCENE OPTIONS: configure settings related to
subtitles, cutscenes and dialogue, including SCOOTALOO's speech
CENSOR MODES: configure settings related to blocking certain content
in the game.
CUSTOMIZE TILT++: configure the tilting/swaying of the camera
an advanced crosshair (this is for advanced users only)
PLAYER SETUP: configure your player settings (name, gender, etc)
SOUND OPTIONS: configure your sound settings
SET VIDEO MODE: change video settings/resolution
GZDOOM OPTIONS (ADVANCED): the original, more advanced GZDoom menu
Go to GZDoom Options (Advanced) for more settings
DD2 Help Screen (NOT BUILT IN ONE)

This skill is just for those who
just want to unwind and don't
want a challenge. Which is fine,
I genuinely don't mind.

This skill is for people who haven't
played many shootan games.
Aggressiveness is low, ammo is doubled,
damage from enemies and their health
is lower, and there are fewer enemies.

This skill is for most people.
Aggressiveness is higher, ammo is normal,
damage is higher, and there's more enemies.

This skill is not for first timers.
Aggressiveness is way higher and
enemies are more numerous.
